name: Shelfy | Mini Jam 75: Wisdom
description:
Shelfy has lost their books! Can you help find them all?

Shelfy is a charming little platformer that combines basic platforming with a unique weight system. Each time you collect a book, you get heavier!

This extra weight can either help or hinder you, making large blocks pushable and making platforms crumble beneath your feet!

(Tip: The down smash completely cancels out your momentum. Use it if you need to make precise jumps!)

Credits:

Coding - Finian

Art - Josh
